rationale: Combination can meaningfully increase risk (thrombosis, bleeding, loss of efficacy, or serious adverse events).
recommended_action: Avoid the combination if possible; if unavoidable consult specialist and monitor closely (lab monitoring, clinical follow-up).

rationale: Potential interaction that may require monitoring or dose adjustment; clinical context matters.
recommended_action: Review therapy alternatives; increase monitoring; adjust doses where recommended.
